metadata.description:
A small Mexican-Chinese village is visited by three young vagabundos, with particular intentions.
Domingo the Lazy, Luiza the Warrior and Nazario the Deceitful may be experts in their field, the inhabitants of Nemcala seem to have an old martial arts tradition.
An explosive mix is preparing in this once glorious village, that hides many secrets.
metadata.name: ¡ Limón !
